Ditanya soal Peluang Ojol Jadi Transportasi Umum, Ini Jawaban Menhub
03 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Usman Hadi


Foto: Usman Hadi - detikcom

Sleman - Menteri Perhubungan (Menhub), Budi Karya Sumadi, angkat bicara mengenai usulan ojek online (ojol) menjadi angkutan umum. Wacana itu berhembus dari kalangan driver ojol. Bagaimana tanggapan Budi Karya mengenai usulan tersebut? "Jadi gini, sebenarnya (kita) nggak usah mempertentangkan fungsi ojol itu sebagai angkutan umum (atau bukan)," ujar Budi Karya kepada wartawan usai menghadiri acara di Universitas 'Aisyiyah di Sleman, Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta (DIY), Minggu (3/11/2019).Menurut Budi Karya, daripada mempertentangkan status ojol lebih baik dilihat fungsi dan manfaat yang dibawa ojol. Di antaranya keberadaan ojol mampu membuka lapangan kerja baru dan berdampak positif bagi industri lainnya."Jutaan masyarakat bisa bekerja, dan juga sekarang ini industri-industri yang lain seperti makanan itu berkembang dengan adanya ojol," tuturnya. Mengingat besarnya manfaat ojol, Budi Karya berjanji akan mengawal agar ojol tetap eksis di Indonesia, caranya dengan membuatkan suatu peraturan khusus. "Saya akan mengawal ya bahwa ojol ini tetap eksis di Indonesia dengan sandaran suatu peraturan," tegasnya.Selain mampu membuka lapangan pekerjaan baru, lanjutnya, keberadaan ojol juga menghadirkan berbagai kemudahan bagi masyarakat. Ia mencontohkan kini dirinya tak perlu ke mana-mana namun tetap bisa memesan makanan sesuai selera."Saya saja tiap hari juga pakai gofood ya, saya nggak usah ke mana-mana makanan datang sendiri pilihan apa saja bisa, satu orang bisa milih lima menu ya dan tidak usah kita pergi ke mana-mana. Jadi saya pikir kemanfaatan daripada ojol ini sangat baik," tutupnya.Mengingat besarnya manfaat ojol, Budi Karya berjanji akan mengawal ojol agar tetap eksis di Indonesia, caranya dengan membuatkan suatu peraturan khusus. "Saya akan mengawal ya bahwa ojol ini tetap eksis di Indonesia dengan sandaran suatu peraturan," tegasnya. Asked about Ojol's Opportunity to Become Public Transportation, This was the Minister's answer
Nov 3, 2019, 12:42 by Usman Hadi


Photo: Usman Hadi - detikcom

Sleman - Minister of Transportation (Menhub), Budi Karya Sumadi, spoke out about the proposed online motorcycle taxi (ojol) to become public transportation. The discourse blows from the ojol driver. How does Budi Karya respond to the proposal? "So, like this, actually (we) don't have to oppose the ojol's function as public transportation (or not)," Budi Karya told reporters after attending an event at 'Aisyiyah University in Sleman, Yogyakarta Special Region (DIY), Sunday (3/11) /2019).According to Budi Karya, rather than contradicting the status of ojol it is better to see the functions and benefits brought by ojol. Among the existence of ojol is able to open new jobs and have a positive impact on other industries. "Millions of people can work, and also now other industries such as food are developing with the presence of ojol," he said. Given the large benefits of ojol, Budi Karya promised to escort the ojol to continue to exist in Indonesia, the way is by making a special regulation. "I will oversee that this ojol still exists in Indonesia with the rest of a regulation," he stressed. Besides being able to open new jobs, he continued, the presence of ojol also presents various facilities for the community. He gave an example now he does not need to go anywhere but still can order food according to taste. "I just also use gofood every day, I don't need to go anywhere food comes alone any choice can, one person can choose five menus, huh? and we don't need to go anywhere. So I think the benefits of ojol are very good, "he concluded. Given the great benefits of ojol, Budi Karya promised to escort ojol to continue to exist in Indonesia, the way is by making a special regulation. "I will oversee yes that this ojol still exists in Indonesia with the rest of a regulation," he said.
